name: Katamari Snow Day
description:
this game is not affiliated with KATAMARI DAMACY or BANDAI NAMCO.  It's a fan work made for fun and out of love :)


It's a chilly day off and the King of the Cosmos is building a snowman!  But he's oh so tired.  Can you help?

Made for Godot jam in just a few days!  Definitely a fun one to make.  :)

please note, Katamari Snow Day requires a controller
